content: crochet a cheerful sunflower the center is made of puff stitches it has all the anatomy of a perfect sunflower including sunny petals a receptacle and stems and leaves you can make this pattern into a fun flower wand to wave around bringing lots of joy or just use the sunflower heads as motifs that make for great home decor both free crochet pattern and video tutorial available ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **instagram** love to see your projects tag me at @ami_amour 1 **youtube** check out my youtube channel 2 to catch all my latest crochet tutorials and projects ~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 15in/38cm tall and the flower diameter is about 8in/20cm wide **level ** intermediate **need to know ** chain single_crochet puff if you re unfamiliar with the stitch my video tutorial also walks you through this stitch half_double_crochet how to assemble pieces together ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ happy crocheting and hope this sunflower brings you some sunshine cheers ami amour 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
